category.name: Change Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CM_note_types_to_track
preference.preference_description: Specifies which product structure note types can be tracked for a particular change type. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values; each string must contain a valid Teamcenter change type, and one or more valid Teamcenter note types using the following syntax:CM_note_types_to_track= Change-Type1:Note-Type1,Note-Type2Change-Type2:Note-Type1,Note-Type4For example, a valid value is: ChangeNotice:UG Geometry,UG NAME
